mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) allNum, COUNT(CASE WHEN to_days(create_time) = to_days(now()) THEN 1 ELSE null END) as nowNum FROM wk_oa_log WHERE create_time between #{beginTime} and #{endTime} AND create_user_id = #{userId}

select a.*, b.dept_id, b.realname, b.img as userImg, soal.customer_ids, soal.contacts_ids, soal.business_ids, soal.contract_ids, (CASE WHEN c.log_id is null THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) as getBulletin, c.customer_num as customerCount, c.business_num as businessCount, c.contract_num as contractCount, c.receivables_money as receivablesMoney, c.activity_num as recordCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wk_work_task_comment WHERE type_id=a.log_id and type='2') as replyNum FROM wk_oa_log as a LEFT JOIN wk_admin_user as b on a.create_user_id=b.user_id LEFT JOIN wk_oa_log_record as c on a.log_id=c.log_id LEFT JOIN wk_oa_log_relation as soal on soal.log_id=a.log_id WHERE a.log_id = #{logId}

select a.comment_id,a.content,a.main_id,b.realname as create_user_name,c.realname as reply_name from wk_work_task_comment as a left join wk_admin_user as b on a.user_id = b.user_id left join wk_admin_user as c on a.pid = c.user_id where type_id = #{typeId} and type = 2
